Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2008 09:10PM StGermain wrote: Dee -You're at an age where you should start mammograms anyway, so why not do it? And if you aren't satisfied with the surgeon and the care you were given (and it doesn't seem to me that you are), get a second opinion. You know, people get three estimates before they get the dent in their car repaired, and yet are willing to stake their life on the first doctor to whom they are referred. That doesn't make sense to me.  Good luck to you,  StG
Posts.Title: Where.... What... How.... Why...When Dee1 nowheregirl
